INT DataCoding::CopyCbsUnicodeBufferAndAdjustBytes (  const UINT8 *  src,
UINT8 *  dest,
INT  bufferlen,
BOOLEAN  haslengthbyte = FALSE
)  [static]
 

copies the bytes inside the unicode characters and copy it into dest, dependend of the endian format. Also the length byte contained in the CBS data buffer unicode buffer is taken into account. Returns the number of converted characters.

WCHAR *  dest,
INT  len
)  [static]
 

transforms a WCHAR string to 7 bit transformable WCHAR string.

const WCHAR *  string
)  [static]
 

Determines the necessary size for the compressed buffer.

const UINT8 *  buffer,
BOOLEAN  haslengthbyte = FALSE

Determines how many WCHARs are contained in the cbs buffer, dependend of the size of buffer.

const UINT8 *  buffer,
UINT8  step = 0

WCHAR *  dest,

checks if a WCHAR string only contains transformable 7 bit characters.

BOOLEAN DataCoding::IsWCharToGsm7Possible (  WCHAR  src  )  [static]
 

checks if WCHAR could be possibly transformed to a 7 bit character.

INT DataCoding::MoveUnicodeBufferAndAdjustBytes (  const UINT8 *  src,
UINT8 *  dest,
INT  bufferlen
)  [static]
 

copies the bytes inside the unicode characters and copy it into dest, dependend of the endian format. Returns the number of converted characters.

INT DataCoding::PackWcharsToSeptets (  const WCHAR *  inbuffer,
INT  nofwcharchrs,
UINT8 *  outbuffer,
INT  size_of_outbuffer,
UINT8  step
)  [static]
 

Packs 7-Bit chars into an array of octets as defined in GSM 03.38, 6.1.2. Returns the number of converted characters.

INT DataCoding::PackWcharsToSeptets (  const WCHAR *  inbuffer,
INT  nofwcharchrs,
UINT8 *  outbuffer,
UINT8  step = 0
)  [static]
 

Packs 7-Bit chars into an array of octets as defined in GSM 03.38, 6.1.2. Returns the size of packed buffer (in bytes).

void DataCoding::UnicodeStringToGsm7DefaultString (  const WCHAR *  src,
CHAR *  dest,
INT  len
)  [static]
 

encodes a unicode string directly in a 7-bit uncompressed string

INT  nofbytes,
WCHAR *  outbuffer,
BOOLEAN  haslengthbyte = FALSE
)  [static]
 

Unpacks an array of octets containing packed 7-bit GSM default alphabet text as defined in GSM 03.38, 6.1.2.

INT  nofwcharchrs,
WCHAR *  outbuffer,
UINT8  step = 0
)  [static]
 

Unpacks an array of octets containing packed 7-bit GSM default alphabet text as defined in GSM 03.38, 6.1.2.
